long_description: The Gerber Basic knife is the perfect companion for the minimalist who wants to go light and fast with a sturdy, affordable blade. Solid stainless-steel design with partial nylon/rubber overlay on the handle is super light and tough. The Gerber Basic knife snaps securely into its rigid sheath; pocket clip is reversible for right- or left-hand and tip-up or tip-down carry.
